duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform gross examination and dissection of histological specimens.
Process incoming specimens in a timely and efficient manner.
Assist Pathologists in a professional manner when needed while grossing.
Clean and maintain all equipment in the area.
Order entry, maintenance of equipment, cleaning, and other related tasks.
Create daily logs of the specimen loads.
Document and communicate all QA incidents appropriately.
Label, print cassettes, and prepare specimens for grossing.
Assist Pathologists and the Pathologist Assistant on frozen section procedures.
Perform other related tasks as directed.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in a chemical, physical, biological, or clinical laboratory science from an accredited college or university (Bachelor’s degree preferred)
